group_1.textRight: ...Tiro[se:5002_shooting_02_s] Finale!
Yes.@All the Familiars have been defeated.
Things were not looking @good for a moment there...
You're welcome.@Are you injured?

group_1.textLeft: Ah! Which reminds me...@[chara:300101:motion_0]My name is...Kanoko Yayoi!

group_1.textRight: It is very nice to meet you.@I am Mami Tomoe.

group_1.textLeft: Nice to meet you too...@Are you also from Kamihama?

group_1.textRight: No, I'm afraid not.@I'm from Mitakihara.
Those Familiars were much@stronger than what I'm used to.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@The ones in Kamihama are powerful.

group_1.textRight: Yes...
(I knew it. I knew there was @something off about this city...)

group_1.textLeft: ...You know...@I haven't fought Witches for a while now...
That's why that battle was so tough for me...

group_1.textRight: So you were aware, were you?@That the battle might be too much for you.
That's…not a good idea.@
These are life-and-death battles.@You can't just fake your way through them.

group_1.textLeft: ...You're right.@I should have brought someone with me...

group_1.textRight: So long as I've made myself @clear, there's no need to apologize.
There is nothing Witches love to prey@on more than reckless Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't go that far...@To say I'm reckless with my life...

group_1.textRight: Of course. However, if you fight without@proper preparation…
You'll meet the same end as if you were.@So please be careful.

group_1.textLeft: ...It's not like I want to do this.

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: You...@And all the other Magical Girls...
You're all just happy to fight Witches,@and nothing else...

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: There's something...way bigger...@Something that deserves more of my time!

group_1.narration: I see. She's focused@on her goals.
She doesn't like being a Magical Girl,@but it is what she has become...
So her time must be split@between what she wants to do@and what she needs to do...
A split between desire and obligation, huh?
Focused, serious... She tries to hide what@she wants because she believes she should.

group_1.textRight: ...Kanoko?
I'm sorry.@I overstepped my bounds.

group_1.textLeft: I really should have been more careful...@I shouldn't have said what I did...

group_1.textRight: No, I crossed a line.@But I would like to ask you something.
If it's all right, could you tell@me what you're really after?
It'll be all right.
Look around.@It's just the two of us...
Don't worry.@[chara:200501:motion_100]I can keep a secret.

group_1.textLeft: I want to be a fashion designer.

group_1.textRight: I see.
A wonderful dream.
